items.title: Microsoft Has a Plan to Keep Its Data Centers From Raising Your Electric Bill

items.title: Urevo SpaceWalk 5L Walking Pad Review: Compact and Affordable
items.description: Urevo’s affordable new walking pad is cheaper than a round-trip ticket to hike in Iceland.

items.title: Board Review: Tabletop Video Games With Physical Pieces
items.description: I loved Board’s unique blend of tabletop gaming, but my family gave it mixed reviews.

items.title: Atonemo Streamplayer Review: Make Old Speakers New Again
items.description: Can this discrete audio puck really drag any old speakers into the streaming age?

items.title: Reid Hoffman Wants Silicon Valley to ‘Stand Up’ Against the Trump Administration
items.description: The LinkedIn cofounder and frequent Trump target has a simple message for his peers: “Just speak up about the things that you think are true.”
